title: Dem Fightin Words? 2021 TidePods 2.17.21
itunes:title: Dem Fightin Words? 2021 TidePods 2.17.21
description:
In episode 813, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Blair Socci to discuss Trump's impeachment acquittal, the criminal lawsuits against Trump, Covid cases dropping in India, The Gorilla Glue challenge, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump's two impeachments hold same lesson: Republicans can't be trusted with our democracy
  2. I Don’t Just Want Trump Impeached. I Want Him Jailed.
  3. India’s dramatic fall in virus cases leaves experts stumped
  4. Covid-19’s Global Divide: As West Reels, Asia Keeps Virus at Bay
  5. Not again! Gorilla Glue Challenge sends Louisiana man to the ER
  6. WATCH: E-TERNITY - Sade Loaded

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
